title: SuperBetter: A Revolutionary Approach - Happy B day Ruby
description:
Jane McGonigal, "SuperBetter: A Revolutionary Approach to Getting Stronger, Happier, Braver and More Resilient--Powered by the Science of Games"

ISBN: 1594206368 | 2015 | EPUB | 480 pages | 1 MB

A remarkable life plan developed from the program four hundred thousand people have used to recover from setbacks and injuries and achieve personal growth

In 2009, game designer and author Jane McGonigal suffered a severe concussion that wouldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t heal. Unable to think clearly, or work, or even get out of bed, she became anxious and depressed, even suicidalÃ¢â‚¬â€a common symptom for concussion sufferers. But rather than let herself sink further, she decided to get better by doing what she does best: she turned her recovery process into a game. What started as a simple motivational exercise became a set of rules she shared on her blog. These rules became a digital game, then an online portal and a major research study with the National Institutes of Health. Today more than 400,000 people have played SuperBetter to get happier and healthier.

SuperBetter: A Revolutionary Approach - Happy B day Ruby
